Even after all these years csgo is still one of the best fps games on steam.
Игра очень скатилась, из-за добавления игры в Free to play, Danger zone тоже очень портит игру((
Entertaining and very competitive game. Sometimes it can get a little toxic but usually its not too bad.

The community, in my personal experience, has been pretty steady. I've never experienced someone truly toxic. Sure, there's mean people, but never someone toxic. A good game to play when you're at home, tired from a good day of working.

O csgo assim como todos os jogos da steam nao abrem
